description:
Alan Sparhawk Band performs at Radio Heartland's Minnesota Music Month showcase
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube

Alan Sparhawk Band performed at Radio Heartland's Minnesota Music Month showcase featuring Kelley Smith, Maygen & The Birdwatcher, and Joe Rainey. This performance marked one of the highest-profile returns to a Minnesota stage since the passing of beloved Mimi Parker. 

Watch Alan Sparhawk Band’s full performance above.

Video Segments
00:00:00 Stranger
00:03:59 Get Still
00:08:36 Can U Hear
00:13:00 I Made This Beat

Musicians
Alan Sparhawk – guitar, vocals
Al Church – drums
Cyrus Sparhawk – bass
